original_text: The guilt offering is just like the sin offering; there is one law for them. The priest who makes atonement with it shall have it.
korean_text: 속죄제와 속건제는 규례가 같으니 그 제물은 속죄하는 제사장에게로 돌아갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: The guilt offering is just like the sin offering
there is one law for them
The priest who makes atonement with it
